accounts.name: bucket
docs: @ audit: Make use of the close account macro for clean closing of the bucket account

accounts.name: usdc_mint
docs: ## @audit put the address constraint to ensure the usdc mint is the specified usdc mint in the constants file

accounts.name: raydium_amm_program
docs: Raydium AMM program: CP-swap on devnet/mainnet (set in your constants)

accounts.name: user_source_token_account
docs: Vault token account acting as the user source for Raydium swap (Raydium expects this field)

accounts.name: user_destination_token_account
docs: Vault token account acting as the user destination for Raydium swap (Raydium expects this field)

accounts.name: user_authority
docs: Vault authority PDA acting as the user authority for Raydium swap (Raydium expects this field)

errors.name: NameTooLong
errors.msg: Bucket name is too long (max 64 characters)

errors.name: InvalidContributionWindow
errors.msg: Invalid contribution window (1 minute to 30 days)

errors.name: InvalidTradingWindow
errors.msg: Invalid trading window (1 minute to 180 days)

errors.name: FeeIsTooLow
errors.msg: Creator fee cannot be lower than 50bps

errors.name: BucketNotRaising
errors.msg: Bucket is not in raising state

errors.name: TokenNotAllowed
errors.msg: Token not allowed in this bucket

errors.name: BucketNotTrading
errors.msg: Bucket is not in trading state

errors.name: InvalidTokenMint
errors.msg: Invalid token mint for this bucket

errors.name: ProfileAlreadyExists
errors.msg: Profile already exists for this creator

errors.name: ProfileDoesNotExist
errors.msg: Profile does not exist for this creator

errors.name: UnauthorizedDeployer
errors.msg: Only the deployer can initialize the program
